title: WeDriveU Appoints Tech & University Transportation Veteran as Managing Director, Customer Success

organizations.name: wedriveu appoints tech & university transportation veteran

text:
Kevin Mathy brings 37 years of experience leading the largest private
bus transportation systems in the U.S.
Kevin Mathy, WeDriveU's Managing Director, Customer Success
BURLINGAME, Calif., May 07, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WeDriveU, the leader in transportation solutions specializing in corporate and university shuttles, today announced Kevin Mathy has joined the company as Managing Director, Customer Success. Mathy’s background in transportation strategy, operations and passenger experience will help WeDriveU accelerate customer mobility programs into the future. His addition reflects WeDriveU’s growth strategy to scale its infrastructure and client services to meet strong customer demand.
Mathy was most recently the Manager of Transportation at Facebook and previously held a similar position as Global Transportation Manager at Google, where he led the largest private transportation system in the United States. Prior to joining the corporate world, he managed university transit and parking operations for Stanford University and the University of California, Berkeley. His strengths in master planning, Transportation Demand Management (TDM), analytics and community relations helped build these programs to be benchmarks for workplace and campus mobility.
WeDriveU Chief Operating Officer Tim Wayland added, “Kevin’s unique perspective as a customer will be instrumental in extending our value to accounts and keeping us at the forefront of innovation. From passengers enjoying seamless wayfinding and a comfortable, productive ride in our state-of-the-art fleet, to our account teams sharing innovative ideas with the facilities and transportation leaders we work alongside at client sites, we’re excited to tap into Kevin’s knowledge and passion for transportation.”
About WeDriveU
WeDriveU is the leader in transportation solutions, specializing in corporate and university shuttles. WeDriveU is experiencing significant growth in its 30 th anniversary year and serves over 6,100,000 annual passengers. Recognized as a pioneer in mobility, WeDriveU is a strategic partner to the world’s top brands, with client programs that consistently earn awards for excellence in commuting and sustainability. WeDriveU operates across the U.S. www.wedriveu.com @wedriveu
